configuration_values_schema.title: Wind speed app configuration
configuration_values_schema.description: Back-end configuration for the wind speed service to enable it to connect to Google Pub/Sub and communicate with other services.

name.description: Type of backend (in this case, it should be GCPPubSub)

project_name.description: Name of the Google Cloud Platform (GCP) project the child exists in.

credentials_filename.description: Absolute path to Google Cloud Platform credentials JSON file.

output_values_schema.title: Output values
output_values_schema.description: The wind speed at the input longitude and latitude.

wind_speeds.description: The wind speed at the location.
